title: Compliment for Ibrahim, Rey, Moghan, Clemence, Taufek & Sharvin
desc: The purpose of writing this is to compliment your hotel staffs for their wonderful service. Thanks to your staff for making it such a comfortable stay at your Sofitel. I was there for 3 days and for all these days I was attended with utmost warmth. I was impressed to see the prompt check in service to Racines despite the peak season. Every need was catered with utmost perfection making me & my guests feel so important. I would like to compliment Ibrahim, Rey, Moghan, Clemance Taufek & Sharvin for being so professional. With smile on their faces, they have been really very impressive in their service. And I would like to visit your hotel again for this outstanding experience.

title: Great food and service
desc: The food is still as good as before. We had the Ngoh Hiang which came piping hot with a great chilli dip, laksa, which was a super generous portion and tasted really authentic and the fried Hokkien Mee (my mum’s favorite), which tastes really good. All dishes can rival those found in street side stalls and has the “wok hei”. Service by Ibrahim and Rey was attentive without being intrusive. We were warmly welcomed by them and taken care of by them throughout. Thanks guys!

title: Dinner @ Racine
desc: Great food especially love the ngoh hiang, hokkien prawn mee and laksa!! Served hot with ample flavors, coupled with warm ambience and great scenery of pinnacle@duxton against the sunset, this is a heartful experience in the city~!

title: nailed it!
desc: Great service and awesome food. Loved the Chicken Satay and the Hookien Mien. Would recommend the place for get togethers with friends or even for solo diners like myself. Service is great, as I never really felt alone despite dining solo. I felt taken cared of. The noodles in the photo really takes you back home.

title: Would definitely come back for more!
desc: The experience was absolutely amazing. The seafood brunch was certainly delightful, leaving all of us craving for more. I would like to extend my heartfelt gratitude to the service staff, particularly Rey and April, who went above and beyond to ensure that our dining experience was exceptional. They were incredibly attentive, and serving us with a smile.

title: Pleasant dining experience
desc: We enjoyed ourselves w d Sunday seafood brunch at racines. Area is also a nice pleasant place to take a stroll around after the meal. Great service from John n team - Rey, Paul n April. Will surely return.

title: Fantastic
desc: Great hotel, food magnificent BUT the staff are the best - unbelievably good. Just stay here if you’re in Singapore. Great location, great pool, train station immediately below you that will get you anywhere in Singapore in minutes.

title: We will come back for more Celebration with love one and friends
desc: The service, atmosphere and food were impressive. Thank you very much to Paul, Reg and Ibrahim for the the great and memorable birthday celebration. We will come back for more Celebration with love one and friends

title: Enjoyable time!
desc: Service was excellent. Rey was attentive throughout and even went out of his way to print drawings of our kid’s favourite cartoon for him to colour. The food was well executed and we enjoyed everything that we ordered. We will come back again.
